@Wilde_Agency @Adweek @GeorgeTakei George puts hit fans first - I think that's the key! @TheEllenShow is another great example! #Adweekchat
@MiaEnberg @Adweek It's coming! #AdweekChat
@GianineRed @adweek Exactly! Know your strengths and play to them. Reevaluate your strengths constantly because they change! #adweekchat
@Adweek I'm also worried about the day emojis overtake words completely. Even I'm not millennial enough for that. #AdweekChat
@Adweek Always. I think the trick is to make sure that as you age, your role grows to fit what you can best offer your company #adweekchat
@Adweek You can't just put a hashtag on something and make it cool. Millennials and younger (and most older) folks won't have it #adweekchat
@Adweek I see it as a chance to work on framing my experience. When you have less experience you've got to make every bit count! #adweekchat
@Adweek It's more experience than age. I look for people who see youth as a chance to build experience rather than a limitation. #adweekchat
@Adweek 22 and just young enough to let all of my coworkers' references to the 80s fly over my head! #adweekchat
